Test Scenario: Validate user registration with valid data
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter strong password (8+ chars with uppercase, lowercase, number, special char)
4. Enter all required fields
5. Submit form
Expected Result:
User account created successfully
Verification email sent
User redirected to login page
Test Data:
Email: test@example.com
Password: TestPass123!
Name: John Doe
Role: customer

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration
2. Try passwords without required criteria
3. Verify error messages
Expected Result:
System rejects weak passwords
Shows specific validation errors
Test Data:
Weak passwords:
- test (too short)
- testtest (no uppercase)
- TestTest (no number)
- TestTest1 (no special char)

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email and password
3. Click login button
Expected Result:
User successfully logged in
Redirected to dashboard
Session created
